sys_variable_value.value:
Dear employee,

it seems like you shared a shift with someone who tested positive for the corona virus.

Please test yourself before coming to work the next time.

 

 

Take care!

Please test yourself before coming to work the next time.

 

 

Take care!

Take care!

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear employee,

it seems like you shared a shift with someone who tested positive for the corona virus.

Please test yourself before coming to work the next time.

 

 

Take care!
